The city of Engagement, Ohio USA is anticipating future rapid growth by doing a participatory urban planning survey. 

A total of 1011 representative residents have agreed to provide their data using the urban planning app, such as the places they visit and their financial journal.

we will reveal the patterns of daily life throughout the city. Specifically, we will characterize the distinct areas within the city, identify the potential traffic bottlenecks, describe the daily routines for selected participants and examine how patterns change over time.
